title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Aug. 25
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Aug. 25
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Veeva Systems (VEEV). Veeva Systems Inc.'s shares are headed for their biggest one-day loss in about 2 1/2 years on a disappointing outlook. The provider of Internet-based software for biotechnology and drug companies expects the amount billed to customers in the third quarter to be no more than $119 million. Analysts were looking for $129 million on average, according to William Blair's Bhavan Suri.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
